channel.title: Adam's Dev Log
channel.description: Recent content on Adam's Dev Log

item.title: Clear Your Terminal in Style
item.description: If you’re someone like me who habitually clears their terminal, sometimes you want a little excitement in your life.

item.title: Coding Livestream 1: Find Every Arby's in America
item.description: In this stream I work on scraping Arby's location information.

item.title: Coding Livestream 2: Let's Deploy an SSH Honeypot
item.description: In this stream I deploy an SSH Honeypot called Cowrie

item.title: Coding Livestream 3: Let's Learn About YARA
item.description: In this stream I go over the way YARA rules work and how to apply them.

item.title: Coding Livestream 4: Computer Vision on Public IP Cams
item.description: In this stream I cover how to harvest IP cameras for computer vision exercises.

item.title: On the future of Apps
item.description: The Death of the App as We Know It As phone technology progressed, apps became the standard for deploying neatly packaged software to the end user.

item.title: Linux Tips: Easy Aliases
item.description: What is an Alias? An alias is a global variable set by linux that can be freely called in terminals and scripts once defined.

item.title: Goodwill Chest Upgrade - Part 2 Electric Boogaloo
item.description: Well that took a while!! 8 months later, and I’m still working on this project.

item.title: Cool New Job
item.description: Being geeky in Petco ended up getting me my dream job Job Description I am working under a Professor that has assigned me to designing the setup of the currently empty lab meant for doing tests on sps coral.

item.title: Goodwill Chest Upgrade
item.description: A search for cheap Goodwill sweaters led me to 0 sweaters and 1 chest too big to fit in my car.

item.title: QR Guitar Experiment
item.description: Inception My first guitar was a beat up acoustic American Standard that had been through many years of not-so-great care.

item.title: On the Future of VR
item.description: While participating in HackPSU Spring ‘16, my team decided to stretch the idea of immersive gaming to another level.

item.title: A New Blog!
item.description: My name is Adam Musciano, and I'm a developer. I've decided to start a blog to act as a repository for my ideas, goals, and reflections.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Want to get in touch with me? Fill out the form below to send me a message and I will try to get back to you within 24 hours!

item.title: Gallery
item.description: Visualized Algorithms Insertion Sort Selection Sort Num Islands (BFS) Grid Expand from Center Grid Expand from Random Generative Art Perlin Circles

item.title: Resume
item.description: Awards Code PSU '16 Top 5 HackDartmouth Best Medical Hack IST IdeamakerChallenge '16 Top 5 Pittsburgh Data Jams '15 Big Data Competition First Place Gannon Programming Competition '15 First Place
